about_the_game:
Which side would you choose? Your love or your heart? Are you really who you think you are?

This is a 2D platformer shooting game with 3 endings in this game, try to explore them all by making your decision. Either way you have to fight different bosses and enemies, solve some puzzles.

There are also some hidden secrets in most levels, try to discover them while playing through the main quest. Sometimes your "Third Eye" superpower can help you with discovering hidden paths.

You spawn with a bow and arrow, but you can change weapon at weapon stands and keep it after death. However, you will have the start over the entire level.

There are a variety of enemies in this game, some can fly and some cannot. Please be aware that they can also spawn from chests too.

You can pick a easier path, but is that what you really want? It is not a easy game, but the point is to keep trying and trying.

You can pick a easier path, but is that what you really want? It is not a easy game, but the point is to keep trying and trying.
